course_description: Explores the study and design of maps and geographic information systems (GIS) as a problem-solving tool for geographic analysis with focus on applications of GIS, data collection and processing, cartographic design, and trends in geospatial technology.
prerequisites: QTM 100 or QTM_OX 100 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
